definitions.definition: Either of two folded sheets of paper used to connect the front and back covers of a book to the first and last pages ; one side of each endpaper is glued to the cover board, and the other side forms a flyleaf .

main_definition: Either of two folded sheets of paper used to connect the front and back covers of a book to the first and last pages ; one side of each endpaper is glued to the cover board, and the other side forms a flyleaf .
